elements.name: Create a template application with no note
Create a template application with a too long note
Create a template application with no templateId
Create a template application with a non existing templateId
Create a template application where at least 1 field is missing

steps.name: def message = 'Missing field ids: [' + template.fields[1].id + '], obsolete field ids: []'

elements.name: Create a template application where all fields are provided but one with an invalid fieldId

steps.name: def message = 'Missing field ids: [' + template.fields[1].id + '], obsolete field ids: [9999, 10000, 10001]'

elements.name: Create a template application where at least 1 field is provided with no value and fieldId

steps.name: match response contains { "message": "This field cannot be empty", "value": "", "key": "value" }

elements.name: Create a template application where at least 1 field is provided with no fieldId

steps.name: match response contains { "message": "This field cannot be empty", "value": "", "key": "fieldId" }

elements.name: Create a valid template application with a deleted template
Create a invalid template application with a deleted template where the fieldValues are missing
Create a template application where the id of a template field is set
